name: Snake-Eye Ash
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 Level 1 FIRE monster from your Deck to your hand. You can send 2 face-up cards you control to the GY, including this card; Special Summon 1 "Snake-Eye" monster from your hand or Deck, except "Snake-Eye Ash". You can only use each effect of "Snake-Eye Ash" once per turn.
